trans-unit.source: Contains HTTP proxy settings for the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder innstillinger for HTTP-proxy for <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>klassen.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The WebProxy class contains the proxy settings that <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances use to determine whether a Web proxy is used to send requests.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebProxy inneholder proxyinnstillinger som <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomster Bruk til å fastslå om en Web-proxy brukes til å sende forespørsler.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: Global Web proxy settings can be specified in machine and application configuration files, and applications can use instances of the WebProxy class to customize Web proxy use.
trans-unit.target: Globale Web proxy-innstillinger som kan angis i maskinen og programmet konfigurasjonsfiler og programmer kan bruke forekomster av klassen WebProxy tilpasse Web-proxy-bruk.

trans-unit.source: The WebProxy class is the base implementation of the <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> interface.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebProxy er base implementering av den <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Net.IWebProxy>

trans-unit.source: To obtain instances of the Web proxy class, you can use any of the following methods: - The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke følgende metoder for å få forekomster av proxy-klassen: - <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy%2A>Metode.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.Select%2A>Metode.</xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods each supply a WebProxy instance that you can further customize; the difference between them is how the instance is initialized before it is returned to your application.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene hver oppgi en WebProxy-forekomst som du kan tilpasse; forskjellen mellom dem er hvordan forekomsten er initialisert før det returneres til programmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.%23ctor%2A> constructor returns an instance of the WebProxy class with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren returnerer en forekomst av klassen WebProxy med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til `null`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a request uses a WebProxy instance in this state, no proxy is used to send the request.
trans-unit.target: Når en forespørsel om en WebProxy-forekomst i denne tilstanden, brukes ingen proxy til å sende forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy%2A> method returns an instance of the WebProxy class with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> properties set to the values used by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy%2A>metoden returnerer en forekomst av klassen WebProxy med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>satt til verdiene som brukes av Internet Explorer 5.5 og nyere.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetDefaultProxy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.Select%2A> method returns an instance of the WebProxy class with it properties set according to a combination of Internet Explorer and configuration file settings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.Select%2A>metoden returnerer en forekomst av klassen WebProxy med den egenskaper som er angitt i henhold til en kombinasjon av innstillingene for Internet Explorer og konfigurasjon flis.</xref:System.Net.GlobalProxySelection.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebProxy class supports automatic detection and execution of proxy configuration scripts.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebProxy støtter automatisk gjenkjenning og utførelse av proxy-konfigurasjonsskript.

trans-unit.source: This feature is also known as Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD).
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonen er også kjent som Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD).

trans-unit.source: When using automatic proxy configuration, a configuration script, typically named Wpad.dat, must be located, downloaded, compiled, and run.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker automatisk proxy-konfigurasjonen, må et konfigurasjonsskript, vanligvis kalt Wpad.dat, finnes, ned, kompilert, og Kjør.

trans-unit.source: If these operations are successful, the script returns the proxies that can be used for a request.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse operasjonene lykkes, returnerer skriptet proxyer som kan brukes for en forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en tom forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty instance of the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> class with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren initialiserer en tom forekomst av den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>klasse med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til `null`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> method returns `true` and the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetProxy%2A> method returns the destination address.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>egenskapen `null`, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A>metoden returnerer `true` og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetProxy%2A>metoden returnerer mål-adresse.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.GetProxy%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klassen med den angitte URIEN.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to a <xref:System.Uri> instance containing `Address`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til en <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder `Address`.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: URIEN for proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: is an invalid URI.
trans-unit.target: er en ugyldig URI.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class from the specified <xref:System.Uri> instance.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klassen fra den angitte <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to the `Address` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til den `Address` parameteren.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class using previously serialized content.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av tidligere serialiserte innhold.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the system to deserialize a <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance; applications do not call it.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av systemet ikke deserialisere en <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomst; programmer vil ikke kall det.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The serialization data.
trans-unit.target: Serialiseringsdataene.

trans-unit.source: The context for the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten for de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the specified URI and bypass setting.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klasse med den angitte URIEN og omgå innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to a <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains `Address` and the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> property set to `BypassOnLocal`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til en <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder `Address` og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassOnLocal`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> </xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: URIEN for proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: is an invalid URI.
trans-unit.target: er en ugyldig URI.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the specified host and port number.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klassen med angitt vert og portnummeret.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to a <xref:System.Uri> instance of the form http:// `Host` : `Port`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til en <xref:System.Uri>forekomst av formatet http:// `Host` : `Port`.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The name of the proxy host.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på proxy-vert.

trans-unit.source: The port number on `Host` to use.
trans-unit.target: Portnummeret på `Host` skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining Host and Port is not a valid URI.
trans-unit.target: URIEN utformet ved å kombinere Host og Port er ikke en gyldig URI.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the <xref:System.Uri> instance and bypass setting.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klasse med den <xref:System.Uri>serverforekomsten og omgå innstillingen.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to `Address` and with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> property set to `BypassOnLocal`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til `Address` og med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassOnLocal`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the specified URI, bypass setting, and list of URIs to bypass.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klassen med den angitte URIEN omgå innstillingen og liste over URIer å omgå.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to a <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains `Address`, the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> property set to `BypassOnLocal`, and the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> property set to `BypassList`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til en <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder `Address`, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassOnLocal`, og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassList`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> </xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: URIEN for proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of regular expression strings that contain the URIs of the servers to bypass.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med RegEx strenger som inneholder URIer serverne til å hoppe over.

trans-unit.source: is an invalid URI.
trans-unit.target: er en ugyldig URI.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of regular expression strings that contains the URIs of the servers to bypass.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av RegEx strenger som inneholder URIer serverne til å hoppe over.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the specified URI, bypass setting, list of URIs to bypass, and credentials.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klasse med den angitte URIEN, omgå innstillingen liste over URIer å omgå, og legitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to a <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains `Address`, the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> property set to `BypassOnLocal`, the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> property set to `BypassList`, and the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property set to `Credentials`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til en <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder `Address`, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassOnLocal`, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassList`, og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>-egenskapen satt til `Credentials`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> </xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: URIEN for proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of regular expression strings that contains the URIs of the servers to bypass.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av RegEx strenger som inneholder URIer serverne til å hoppe over.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> instance to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.ICredentials>forekomsten å sende den til proxy-server for godkjenning.</xref:System.Net.ICredentials>

trans-unit.source: is an invalid URI.
trans-unit.target: er en ugyldig URI.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Uri> instance, bypass setting, list of URIs to bypass, and credentials.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref:System.Uri>serverforekomsten, omgå innstillingen liste over URIer å omgå, og legitimasjonen.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property set to `Address`, the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> property set to `BypassOnLocal`, the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> property set to `BypassList`, and the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property set to `Credentials`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomsten er initialisert med den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>-egenskapen satt til `Address`, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassOnLocal`, <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>-egenskapen satt til `BypassList`, og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>-egenskapen satt til `Credentials`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of regular expression strings that contains the URIs of the servers to bypass.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av RegEx strenger som inneholder URIer serverne til å hoppe over.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> instance to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.ICredentials>forekomsten å sende den til proxy-server for godkjenning.</xref:System.Net.ICredentials>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir adressen til proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: The Address property contains the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for postadressen inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: When automatic proxy detection is not enabled, and no automatic configuration script is specified, the Address property and <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> determine the proxy used for a request.
trans-unit.target: Når automatisk proxy-gjenkjenning er ikke aktivert, og ingen skript for automatisk konfigurasjon er angitt, egenskapen Address og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>fastslå proxyen brukes for en forespørsel.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the Address property is `null`, requests bypass the proxy and connect directly to the destination host.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen Address er `null`, forespørsler omgå proxy og koble direkte til målet verten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the address of the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten som inneholder adressen til proxy-serveren.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of addresses that do not use the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over adresser som ikke bruker proxy-server.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> is an array list of regular expression strings that describe the URIs that a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance accesses directly instead of through the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>er en matrise liste over RegEx strenger som beskriver URIer som en <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomsten har tilgang til direkte i stedet for via proxy-server.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains a list of <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList*> arrays that represents URIs that do not use the proxy server when accessed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> som inneholder en liste over <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList*>matriser som representerer URIer som ikke bruk proxy-server ved tilgang til.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of addresses that do not use the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise av adresser som ikke bruker proxy-server.

trans-unit.source: The BypassList property contains an array of regular expressions that describe URIs that a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance accesses directly instead of through the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BypassList inneholder en matrise med vanlige uttrykk som beskriver URIer som en <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomsten har tilgang til direkte i stedet for via proxy-server.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: An array that contains a list of regular expressions that describe URIs that do not use the proxy server when accessed.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder en liste over vanlig uttrykk som beskriver URIer som ikke bruk proxy-server ved tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å omgå proxy-serveren for lokale adresser.

trans-unit.source: The setting of the BypassProxyOnLocal property determines whether <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instances use the proxy server when accessing local Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: Innstillingen for egenskapen BypassProxyOnLocal bestemmer om <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomster bruk proxy-server ved tilgang til lokale Internett-ressurser.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: If BypassProxyOnLocal is `true`, requests to local Internet resources do not use the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BypassProxyOnLocal `true`, forespørsler til lokale Internett-ressurser ikke bruk proxy-serveren.

trans-unit.source: Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in http://webserver/, or access the local server, including http://localhost, http://loopback, or http://127.0.0.1.
trans-unit.target: Lokale forespørsler identifiseres av manglende et punktum (.) i URI, som i http://webserver/, eller få tilgang til den lokale serveren, inkludert http://localhost, http://loopback eller http://127.0.0.1.

trans-unit.source: When BypassProxyOnLocal is `false`, all Internet requests are made through the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Når BypassProxyOnLocal er `false`, alle Internett-forespørsler utføres via proxy-server.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Requests to a local host with a URI that contain a period use the proxy.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Forespørsler til en lokal vert med en URI som inneholder et punktum bruke proxyen.

trans-unit.source: To avoid using a proxy in these cases, create an entry for the host in the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For å unngå å bruke en proxy i disse tilfellene må du opprette en oppføring for vert i <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to bypass the proxy server for local addresses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>omgå proxy-serveren for lokale adresser; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir legitimasjon for å sende den til proxy-server for godkjenning.

trans-unit.source: The Credentials property contains the authentication credentials to send to the proxy server in response to an HTTP 407 (proxy authorization) status code.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen legitimasjonen inneholder godkjenningsinformasjonen sende til proxy-serveren som svar på en statuskode HTTP 407 (proxy-godkjenning).

trans-unit.source: In most client scenarios, you should use the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>, which are the credentials of the currently logged on user.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller av klienten, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>, som er legitimasjonen til brukeren som er logget på.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> property to `true` instead of setting this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, kan du angi den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>egenskapen `true` i stedet for å angi denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the Credentials property to credentials other than the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>, setting the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> property to `true` causes a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du angi legitimasjonen egenskapen legitimasjon enn den <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>, aktiveres i <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>egenskapen `true` forårsaker en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent this, you must set the Credentials property to `null` before setting the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan unngå dette ved å angi egenskapen legitimasjon `null` før du konfigurerer den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, you cannot set this property to any value when <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte kan du angi denne egenskapen til en verdi når <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.ICredentials> instance that contains the credentials to submit to the proxy server for authentication.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.ICredentials>forekomsten som inneholder legitimasjonen som skal sendes til proxy-server for godkjenning.</xref:System.Net.ICredentials>

trans-unit.source: You attempted to set this property when the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Du forsøkte å angi denne egenskapen når den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials*>-egenskap er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.UseDefaultCredentials*>

trans-unit.source: Reads the Internet Explorer nondynamic proxy settings.
trans-unit.target: Leser nondynamic proxy-innstillingene for Internet Explorer.

trans-unit.source: The GetDefaultProxy method reads the nondynamic proxy settings stored by Internet Explorer 5.5 and later, and creates a <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> instance with those settings.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDefaultProxy leser nondynamic proxyinnstillinger som er lagret av Internet Explorer 5.5 og nyere og oppretter en <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>forekomst med disse innstillingene.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: The GetDefaultProxy method does not pick up any dynamic settings that are generated from scripts run by Internet Explorer, from automatic configuration entries, or from DHCP or DNS lookups.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDefaultProxy henter ikke opp dynamiske innstillinger som er generert fra skript kjøre av Internet Explorer, automatisk konfigurasjon oppføringer eller DHCP eller DNS-oppslag.

trans-unit.source: Applications should use the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of the GetDefaultProxy method.
trans-unit.target: Programmer skal bruke den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen og <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden i stedet for metoden GetDefaultProxy.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> instance that contains the nondynamic proxy settings from Internet Explorer 5.5 and later.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> forekomsten som inneholder nondynamic proxyinnstillinger fra Internet Explorer 5.5 og nyere.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data that is needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> med data som kreves for å serialisere målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Alle objekter som er inkludert i den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automatisk sporet og serialiseres med formateringen.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som angir målet for denne serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Returns the proxied URI for a request.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer proxy URIEN for en forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The GetProxy method returns the URI that the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance uses to access the Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetProxy returnerer URI den <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomsten bruker for å få tilgang til Internett-ressursen.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: GetProxy compares `destination` with the contents of <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>, using the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetProxy sammenligner `destination` med innholdet i <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A> returns `true`, GetProxy returns `destination` and the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance does not use the proxy server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A>returnerer `true`, GetProxy returnerer `destination` og <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomsten ikke bruk proxy-server.</xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.IsBypassed%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `destination` is not in <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>, the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance uses the proxy server and the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `destination` er ikke i <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>, <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>forekomsten bruker proxy-serveren og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>egenskapen returneres.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> instance of the requested Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>forekomst av den forespurte ressursen på Internett.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> instance of the Internet resource, if the resource is on the bypass list; otherwise, the <xref:System.Uri> instance of the proxy.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>forekomst av Internett-ressursen, hvis ressursen ligger på omgåelseslisten; ellers den <xref:System.Uri>forekomst av proxyen.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The destination parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The destination parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to use the proxy server for the specified host.
trans-unit.target: Angir om du vil bruke proxy-serveren for den angitte verten.

trans-unit.source: The IsBypassed method is used to determine whether to bypass the proxy server when accessing an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsBypassed brukes til å bestemme om å omgå proxy-server ved tilgang til en Internett-ressursen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> and <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> properties control the return value of the IsBypassed method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>og <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>egenskapene kontroll returverdien for metoden IsBypassed.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>

trans-unit.source: IsBypassed returns `true` under any of the following conditions: - If <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A> is `true` and `host` is a local URI.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer IsBypassed `true` under noen av følgende: – Hvis <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>er `true` og `host` er en lokal URI.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassProxyOnLocal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Local requests are identified by the lack of a period (.) in the URI, as in "http://webserver/".
trans-unit.target: Lokale forespørsler identifiseres av manglende et punktum (.) i URI, som i "http://webserver/".

trans-unit.source: - If `host` matches a regular expression in <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis `host` samsvarer med et vanlig uttrykk i <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.BypassList%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: - If <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A> is `null`.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other conditions return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre betingelser returnere `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> instance of the host to check for proxy use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>forekomsten for å kontrollere proxy-bruk.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: if the proxy server should not be used for host; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis proxy-serveren ikke skal brukes host ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: The host parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The host parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Creates the serialization data and context that are used by the system to serialize a <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter serialiseringsdataene og sammenheng som brukes av systemet til å serialisere en <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The system calls this method to serialize an object; applications do not call it directly.
trans-unit.target: Systemet kaller denne metoden for å serialisere et objekt. programmer kall ikke den direkte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> structure that indicates the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>-strukturen som angir målet for denne serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that controls whether the <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials*> are sent with requests.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som kontrollerer om den <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials*>sendes med forespørsler.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials*> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` when requests made by this <xref:System.Net.WebProxy> object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true` når forespørsler utført av dette <xref:System.Net.WebProxy>objektet skal, hvis forespurt av serveren, godkjennes med legitimasjonen til brukeren som er logget på.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy>

trans-unit.source: For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Dette er ønsket virkemåte i de fleste tilfeller for klientprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
trans-unit.target: For midterste skalaenhet programmer, for eksempel ASP.NET-applikasjoner i stedet for å bruke denne egenskapen vil vanligvis angis av <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>egenskapen legitimasjonen for klienten på vegne av forespørsel.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the effect of setting the UseDefaultCredentials value, based on the value of the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser resultatet av UseDefaultCredentials-verdien, basert på verdien for den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> value|UseDefaultCredentials value|Effect| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>|`true`|No effect.| |<xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>|`false`|<xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> is set to `null`.| |`null`|`true`|<xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.| |Any value other than <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> or `null`|`true` or `false`|Setting UseDefaultCredentials throws an exception.| If UseDefaultCredentials is `false`, you can change the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property to any credentials.
trans-unit.target: | verdien for <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>| Verdien for UseDefaultCredentials | Effekt | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| | <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>| `true`| Ingen virkning. | | <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>| `false`| <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>er satt til `null`. | | `null`|`true`|<xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> is set to <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>.| | En annen verdi enn <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>eller `null` | `true` eller `false`| Angi UseDefaultCredentials oppstår det et unntak. | Hvis UseDefaultCredentials `false`, kan du endre den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>egenskapen ingen legitimasjon.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: If UseDefaultCredentials is `true`, changing the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A> property from <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> (the value that is set when the UseDefaultCredentials property is set to `true`) will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis UseDefaultCredentials `true`, endring av <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>egenskapen fra <xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A>(verdien som er angitt når egenskapen UseDefaultCredentials er satt til `true`) vil Iverksett et unntak.</xref:System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default credentials are used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du er i bruk av standardlegitimasjon. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You attempted to set this property when the <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials*> property contains credentials other than the default credentials.
trans-unit.target: Du forsøkte å angi denne egenskapen når den <xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials*>egenskapen inneholder legitimasjon enn standardlegitimasjon.</xref:System.Net.WebProxy.Credentials*>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se kommentarer.
